property.name: Text
property.value: Over Realm 3. Auto: When you play this card using Over Realm, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck. Choose up to 1 of them and add it to your hand. Then, place the remaining cards on the top or bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Over Realm 5: 1. Auto: When you play this card using Over Realm, choose any number of opponent Battle Cards without Blocker for which the total cost adds up to 5 or less and send them to their Warp.

card.name: Supreme Kai of Time, Continuity Keeper

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 black Battle Card with an energy cost of 5 or less from your deck and send it to your Warp and shuffle your deck. Then, at the beginning of your next turn, if this card is in play in your Battle Area, add the card that was sent to your Warp by this skill to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Over Realm 4. Auto: When you play this card using Over Realm, choose up to 1 opponent Battle Card with an energy cost of 2 or less and gain control of it (Move the chosen card to your Battle Area in the same mode).

property.name: Text
property.value: Over Realm 4. Auto: When you play this card using Over Realm, it gains Critical for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blocker. Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is green or yellow, place up to 2 cards from the top of your deck in the Drop Area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is red or blue, place up to 2 cards from the top of your deck in the Drop Area. Auto: When this card attacks, this card gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn.
